document.full_text: mississippi will switch to a different sedative drug for three executions the state is seeking to carry out in the next month, state attorney general jim hood told reuters on tuesday.
document.title: mississippi switches to new drug for executions
lines_and_colors: mississippi will switch to a different sedative drug for three executions the state is seeking to carry out in the next month, state attorney general jim hood told reuters on tuesday.
